statement.title: Problem Description
statement.content:
A Fibonacci sequence is calculated by adding the previous two members the sequence, with the first two members being both 1.
F(1) = 1, F(2) = 1, F(3) = 1,F(4) = 1, F(n>4) = F(n - 1) + F(n-2) + F(n-3) + F(n-4)
Your task is to take a number as input, and print that Fibonacci number.

statement.title: Input
statement.content: Each line will contain an integers. Process to end of file.

statement.title: Output
statement.content: For each case, output the result in a line.

statement.title: Sample Output
statement.content:
4203968145672990846840663646


Note:
No generated Fibonacci number in excess of 2005 digits will be in the test data, ie. F(20) = 66526 has 5 digits.
